name: Evan Sandhoefner
body:
### Coding Projects
[Custom Catan](http://CustomCatan.tk)
* Settlers of Catan board generator
* JavaScript (with jQuery), PHP, CSS

[Visualizing a Link Between Weather and Wealth](http://sandhoefner.github.io/worldbank)
* Data visualizations exploring the economics of climate change, commissioned by the World Bank
* JavaScript (with D3)

[100 Years of American Electoral Politics](http://ryandkerr.github.io/cs171-final)
* Data visualizations exploring U.S. general elections from 1912 to 2012
* Javascript (with D3)

Connect Four AI: [Interactive Game](http://goo.gl/HFVE6h) and [Two-AI Showdown](http://goo.gl/Wdq57A)
* Adjustable-difficulty AI with command-line interface, using MiniMax and AlphaBeta pruning
* Python

### About
I am a sophomore at Harvard College studying Economics and Computer Science. Originally from Anaheim, CA, I enjoy rock climbing, watching basketball, and playing string instruments.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
